rukus.text: Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha Yusabbihu Lahu Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa At-Tayru Saffatin Kullun Qad `Alima Salatahu Wa Tasbihahu Wa Allahu `Alimun Bima Yaf`aluna
Wa Lillahi Mulku As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa 'Ila Allahi Al-Masiru

Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha Yuzji Sahabaan Thumma Yu'uallifu Baynahu Thumma Yaj`aluhu Rukamaan Fatara Al-Wadqa Yakhruju Min Khilalihi Wa Yunazzilu Mina As-Sama'i Min Jibalin Fiha Min Baradin Fayusibu Bihi Man Yasha'u Wa Yasrifuhu `An Man Yasha'u Yakadu Sana Barqihi Yadh/habu Bil-'Absari
Yuqallibu Allahu Al-Layla Wa An-Nahara 'Inna Fi Dhalika La`ibratan Li'wli Al-'Absari

Wa Allahu Khalaqa Kulla Dabbatin Min Ma'in Faminhum Man Yamshi `Ala Batnihi Wa Minhum Man Yamshi `Ala Rijlayni Wa Minhum Man Yamshi `Ala 'Arba`in Yakhluqu Allahu Ma Yasha'u 'Inna Allaha `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Laqad 'Anzalna 'Ayatin Mubayyinatin Wa Allahu Yahdi Man Yasha'u 'Ila Siratin Mustaqimin
Wa Yaquluna 'Amanna Billahi Wa Bir-Rasuli Wa 'Ata`na Thumma Yatawalla Fariqun Minhum Min Ba`di Dhalika Wa Ma 'Ula'ika Bil-Mu'uminina
Wa 'Idha Du`u 'Ila Allahi Wa Rasulihi Liyahkuma Baynahum 'Idha Fariqun Minhum Mu`riđuna
Wa 'In Yakun Lahumu Al-Haqqu Ya'tu 'Ilayhi Mudh`inina
Afi Qulubihim Marađun 'Am Artabu 'Am Yakhafuna 'An Yahifa Allahu `Alayhim Wa Rasuluhu Bal 'Ula'ika Humu Az-Zalimun
